correspAction.name: the Agricultural Department, University of California

head.supplied: Receipts ¶ ¶ AGRICULTURAL DEPARTMENT ¶ . ¶ ¶ ¶ of ¶ Catalogue. University of California. Catalogue....

div.p: To the Agricultural Department, University of California
University Herbarium, University of California, Berkeley.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p:
MS is a list of names, addresses and nature of donation, entered on the left-hand page of a double-page spread (numbered 77) with the main heading spread across the two pages and printed column headings, the terms of which have been ignored in making the entries. Item is dated to earlyJuly 1894 as the latest the package could have been sent, to reach California by mid-August. Receipts
AGRICULTURAL DEPARTMENT . of
